title: Champion Mastery Question
body:
I wanted to ask if somebody knew what happens with the excess mastery points earned lvl 5+

Will they be added to the following tier when it is released?

replies.body:
You keep getting points, and they simply go to tier 6/7 on release (plus any they release after them)

There are files for Tier 6/7 so we know they are coming at some point.

EDIT: and basically they look pretty on your profile until then.
